functions.name: abs
functions.description: giving the absolute value of its argument

functions.name: acs
functions.description: Returns the radian angle for the specified cos ratio

functions.name: adval
functions.description: Returns a value from a joystick or free memory from sound queue.  The specified inputType decides what joystick button, sound queue... to get the value from.

functions.name: asc
functions.description: returning the ASCII character value of the first character of the argument string

functions.name: auto
functions.description: Automatically generates line numbers.  AUTO mode can be escaped by hitting the ESCAPE key.

functions.name: clear
functions.description: Clears all variables

functions.name: close#
functions.description: Closes a disc or casette file.

functions.name: colour
functions.description: sets the text foreground and background colour or modifies the colour palette

functions.name: deg
functions.description: the DEG function is equivalent to multiplying by 180/PI

functions.name: ellipse
functions.description: draws an outline ellipse or filled ellipse, in all screen modes except MODE 7

functions.name: gcol
functions.description: selects the logical colours used by graphics statements

functions.name: ln
functions.description: returns the base-e logarithm of its argument

functions.name: log
functions.description: returns the base-10 logarithm of its argument

functions.name: mod
functions.description: returns the modulus (square-root of the sum of the squares of all the elements) of a numeric array

functions.name: move
functions.description: Moves to the specified coordinates

functions.name: origin
functions.description: sets the graphics origin to the specified x and y coordinates

functions.name: oscli
functions.description: Interprets the specified command string like a command shell would

functions.name: pi
functions.description: Returns the value of pi

functions.name: rad
functions.description: Converts degrees to radians

functions.name: repeat until
functions.description: Waits for the specified condition

functions.name: report$
functions.description: Returns message from the last error

functions.name: sum
functions.description: Sums up an array of numbers or an array of strings.  For numbers, they're just added together.  For strings, they're concatenated together.

functions.name: trace
functions.description: Starts printing all lines executed

functions.name: vdu
functions.description: Performs one of a variety of important actions, primarily involving the screen display and graphics

keywords.description: Marks the start of a case-statement
Marks the end of a case-statement
Marks the end of a procedure
Marks the end of a while-loop
Used within case-statements for saying what happens when the case value matches specific values

operators.description: Multiplies right operand value with the assigned variable
Adds right operand value to the assigned variable
Subtracts right operand value from the assigned variable
Divides assigned value by right operand value
Bit shift left.  QBasic's equivalent would be something like x * 2^ y.
Bit shift right.  QBasic's equivalent would be something like x \ (2^ y).
Integer divides assigned value by right operand value
Assigns to left operand variable the value of left mod right.

unary.name: HexFormat
unary.description: Converts specified integer value to a string in base 16
